tables.statement: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _activity_event; CREATE TABLE _activity_event (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_event_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_target_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_target_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_object_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_object_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_timeline_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _my_reference_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_reference_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_edition enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT 'N', _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_category set('auto','beauty','crafts','family','fashion','food','health','home','movies','music','people','sports','tech','travel','business','humor','animals','science','books','arts') COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_event_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _my_language varchar(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_language_variant varchar(3) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_region varchar(3) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted), KEY _idx__my__object__id (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_event_type,_my_object_id), KEY _idx__my__edition (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_edition,_my_event_type,_my_object_id), KEY _idx__my__target__id (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_target_id), KEY _idx__my__reference__id (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_reference_id,_my_event_type), KEY _idx__created__date (_app_id,_is_deleted,_created_date), KEY _idx__event__date (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_event_date )) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _album; CREATE TABLE _album (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_image_url varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_image_attrs varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_slug varchar(135) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_external_url varchar(2083) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_category set('auto','beauty','crafts','family','fashion','food','health','home','movies','music','people','sports','tech','travel','business','humor','animals','science','books','arts') COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_source varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__my_slug (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_slug), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _audit_log; CREATE TABLE _audit_log ( _app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_object_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_object_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_action varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted), KEY _idx__my__object__type (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_object_type,_my_object_id), KEY _idx__my__action (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_action,_my_object_type,_my_object_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS backup_catalog; CREATE TABLE backup_catalog (updated_date bigint(20) NOT NULL, md5 varchar(128) CHARACTER SET latin1 NOT NULL, catalog_json longtext CHARACTER SET latin1) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS backup__restaurant; CREATE TABLE backup__restaurant (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_external_source_id varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_image_url varchar(1000) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_image_attrs varchar(1000) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_address varchar(250) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_city varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_state varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_country varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_latitude float DEFAULT NULL, _my_longitude float DEFAULT NULL, _my_zip varchar(15) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_phone varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_website varchar(1000) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_attire varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_cuisine varchar(1000) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_cost int(11) DEFAULT NULL, _my_hours varchar(2000) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_requires_reservations enum('Y','N') CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_has_bar enum('Y','N') CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_has_full_bar enum('Y','N') CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_has_beer_wine enum('Y','N') CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_has_street_parking enum('Y','N') CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_has_parking_lot enum('Y','N') CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_has_valet_parking enum('Y','N') CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_slug varchar(135) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_status varchar(250) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT 'open') ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _bookmarklet_log; CREATE TABLE _bookmarklet_log (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_source_url varchar(2083) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_status_code int(11) DEFAULT NULL, _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS boost_snapshot; CREATE TABLE boost_snapshot (app_id int(11) NOT NULL, date date NOT NULL, type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, object_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, score double NOT NULL, UNIQUE KEY app_id (app_id,type,date,object_id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS catalog; CREATE TABLE catalog (updated_date bigint(20) NOT NULL, md5 varchar(128) NOT NULL, catalog_json longtext) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _collection; CREATE TABLE _collection ( _app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_size int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', _my_slug varchar(135) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_foodie_size int(11) DEFAULT '0', _my_cannes_size int(11) DEFAULT '0', _my_cannes_objects_size int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', _my_cannes_collections_size int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', _my_category set('auto','beauty','crafts','family','fashion','food','health','home','movies','music','people','sports','tech','travel','business','humor','animals','science','books','arts') COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_collect_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _my_publish_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _my_path varchar(400) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_language varchar(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_language_variant varchar(3) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_region varchar(3) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__my_slug (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_slug), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _collection_member; CREATE TABLE _collection_member ( _app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_collection_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_object_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_object_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_position int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', _my_group int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '2', PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted), KEY _idx__my__collection__id (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_collection_id,_my_object_id), KEY _idx__my__object__id (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_object_id,_my_collection_id), KEY _idx__my__collection__type (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_collection_id,_my_object_type), KEY _idx__position (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_collection_id,_my_position), KEY _idx__group (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_collection_id,_my_group), KEY idx_cmx_1 (_my_collection_id,_my_object_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _collection_member_activity; CREATE TABLE _collection_member_activity (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_event_time bigint(20) NOT NULL, _my_event_type varchar(30) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_collection_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_object_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_object_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_position int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', _my_group int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '2', _my_payload mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _my_collection longtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _my_member longtext COLLATE utf8_bin, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id,_my_event_time), KEY _idx__my__group (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_group), KEY _idx__my__position (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_position), KEY _idx__my__collection__id__object (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_collection_id,_my_object_type), KEY _idx__my__object__id__collection (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_object_id,_my_collection_id), KEY _idx__my__object__event (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_event_type,_my_object_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin /*!50100 PARTITION BY RANGE (  _my_event_time) (PARTITION p1 VALUES LESS THAN (1420099200) ENGINE = InnoDB, PARTITION p2 VALUES LESS THAN (1435734000) ENGINE = InnoDB, PARTITION p3 VALUES LESS THAN (1441090800) ENGINE = InnoDB, PARTITION p4 VALUES LESS THAN (1446361200) ENGINE = InnoDB, PARTITION p5 VALUES LESS THAN (1451635200) ENGINE = InnoDB, PARTITION p6 VALUES LESS THAN (1456819200) ENGINE = InnoDB, PARTITION p7 VALUES LESS THAN (1462086000) ENGINE = InnoDB, PARTITION p8 VALUES LESS THAN (1467356400) ENGINE = InnoDB, PARTITION p9 VALUES LESS THAN (1472713200) ENGINE = InnoDB, PARTITION p10 VALUES LESS THAN (1477983600) ENGINE = InnoDB, PARTITION p11 VALUES LESS THAN (1483257600) ENGINE = InnoDB, PARTITION p12 VALUES LESS THAN (1488355200) ENGINE = InnoDB, PARTITION p13 VALUES LESS THAN (1493622000) ENGINE = InnoDB, PARTITION p14 VALUES LESS THAN (1498892400) ENGINE = InnoDB, PARTITION p15 VALUES LESS THAN (1504249200) ENGINE = InnoDB, PARTITION p16 VALUES LESS THAN (1509519600) ENGINE = InnoDB, PARTITION p17 VALUES LESS THAN (1514793600) ENGINE = InnoDB, PARTITION p18 VALUES LESS THAN MAXVALUE ENGINE = InnoDB) */;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS CONTACT_REPLICATION; CREATE TABLE CONTACT_REPLICATION (_contact_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _from varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _to varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_contact_app_id,_from,_to) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS CONTENT_CHANGE_LOG; CREATE TABLE CONTENT_CHANGE_LOG (SEQ int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, EVENT_DT timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, APP_ID int(11) NOT NULL, SHAPE varchar(88) NOT NULL, ID int(11) NOT NULL, EVENT_TYPE char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'I', VERSION int(11) NOT NULL, PROFILE_ID int(11) DEFAULT NULL, SCREEN_NAME varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, DATA_LENGTH int(11) DEFAULT NULL, BLOB_ID int(11) DEFAULT NULL, BLOB_SIZE int(11) DEFAULT NULL, IP_ADDRESS binary(4) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (SEQ)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=139706320 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS content_seq; CREATE TABLE content_seq (app_id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, seq_id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (app_id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _core_object; CREATE TABLE _core_object (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_slug varchar(135) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_category set('auto','beauty','crafts','family','fashion','food','health','home','movies','music','people','sports','tech','travel','business','humor','animals','science','books','arts') COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_external_url varchar(2083) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_image_url varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_image_attrs varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_redis_id varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_type varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_path varchar(400) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_approved varchar(1) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_language varchar(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_language_variant varchar(3) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_region varchar(3) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_video_urls text COLLATE utf8_bin, _my_has_mode_video enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT 'N', _my_alt_media text COLLATE utf8_bin, _my_source varchar(2083) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_source_author varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__my__redis_id (_app_id,_my_redis_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _didit; CREATE TABLE _didit (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_image_url varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_image_attrs varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_object_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_object_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_action_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _my_source varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _discovery_item; CREATE TABLE _discovery_item (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_target_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_target_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_activity_event_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_activity_date bigint(20) NOT NULL, _my_latitude float DEFAULT NULL, _my_longitude float DEFAULT NULL, _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_category set('auto','beauty','crafts','family','fashion','food','health','home','movies','music','people','sports','tech','travel','business','humor','animals','science','books','arts') COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_reference_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_reference_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_approved varchar(1) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT '', _my_target_language varchar(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_target_language_variant varchar(3) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_target_region varchar(3) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_activity_language varchar(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_activity_language_variant varchar(3) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_activity_region varchar(3) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__target__id__unique (_app_id,_my_target_id,_is_deleted), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted), KEY _idx__my__latitude__longitude (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_target_type,_my_latitude,_my_longitude), KEY _idx__my__is__approved (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_approved,_my_target_type)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _email_settings; CREATE TABLE _email_settings (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_notify_follow enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Y', _my_notify_love enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Y', _my_notify_collect enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Y', _my_notify_reply enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Y', _my_notify_didit enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Y', _my_notify_collect_from enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT 'Y', _my_notify_subscribe enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT 'Y', _my_notify_subscribed_item_update enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT 'Y', _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__author__unique (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _external_auth; CREATE TABLE _external_auth (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_identifier varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_provider varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_display_name varchar(128) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_username varchar(128) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__identifier__unique (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_identifier), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted), KEY _idx__identifier (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_provider,_my_identifier)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _featured_item; CREATE TABLE _featured_item (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_active enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_featured_date bigint(20) NOT NULL, _my_target_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_target_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_affiliate_id varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_payload mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _my_starred enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_pin_to_homepage enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_app_context varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__target__id__unique (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_target_id,_my_app_context), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted), KEY _idx__my__pinned (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_pin_to_homepage,_my_active), KEY _idx__my__starred (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_starred,_my_active)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _featured_relative; CREATE TABLE _featured_relative (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_object_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_featured_item_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_active enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT 'N', _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_app_context varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__combination__unique (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_object_id,_my_featured_item_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted), KEY _idx__featured__id (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_featured_item_id), KEY _idx__active (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_object_id,_my_app_context,_my_active)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _hydra_feed_definitions; CREATE TABLE _hydra_feed_definitions (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__title (_app_id,_title), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _hydra_feed_results; CREATE TABLE _hydra_feed_results ( _app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__title (_app_id,_title), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _invite; CREATE TABLE _invite (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_code varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_recipient_email varchar(256) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__code (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_code), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS key_value; CREATE TABLE key_value (Rec_ID bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `Key` varchar(1024) DEFAULT NULL, SubKey varchar(1024) DEFAULT NULL, score int(11) DEFAULT NULL, Value text, PRIMARY KEY (Rec_ID), KEY idx_cmx_1 (`Key`(768)), KEY idx_cmx_2 (`Key`(350),SubKey(350)), KEY idx_cmx_3 (`Key`(384),SubKey(150),Value(150))) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=60864110 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _media_file; CREATE TABLE _media_file (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_object_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_object_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_blob_url varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_width int(11) DEFAULT NULL, _my_height int(11) DEFAULT NULL, _my_mime_type varchar(80) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_label1 varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_label2 varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted), KEY _idx__object__id (_app_id,_my_object_id,_is_deleted), KEY _idx__label (_app_id,_my_label1,_my_label2,_is_deleted)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_tracking; CREATE TABLE migration_tracking (id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, operation varchar(255) NOT NULL, created_dt datetime NOT NULL, migration_tag varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, version int(11) DEFAULT NULL, commit_hash varchar(255) NOT NULL, username varchar(255) NOT NULL, hostname varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _news; CREATE TABLE _news (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_image_url varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_image_attrs varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_slug varchar(135) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_external_url varchar(2083) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_category set('auto','beauty','crafts','family','fashion','food','health','home','movies','music','people','sports','tech','travel','business','humor','animals','science','books','arts') COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_source varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__my_slug (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_slug), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _notification; CREATE TABLE _notification (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_object_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_object_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_read enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_recipient_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_notification_type varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_target_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_target_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted), KEY _idx__recipient__id (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_recipient_id), KEY _idx__object (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_object_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _recipe; CREATE TABLE _recipe (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_image_url varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_image_attrs varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_cuisine varchar(25) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_methods varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_complexity varchar(25) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_health_factor varchar(25) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_allergies varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_dietary_considerations varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_yields int(11) DEFAULT NULL, _my_prep_time int(11) DEFAULT NULL, _my_cook_time int(11) DEFAULT NULL, _my_ingredients mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _my_steps mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _my_source varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_external_url varchar(2083) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_slug varchar(135) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_category set('auto','beauty','crafts','family','fashion','food','health','home','movies','music','people','sports','tech','travel','business','humor','animals','science','books','arts') COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__my_slug (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_slug), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted), KEY _idx__external__url (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_external_url(255))) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _restaurant; CREATE TABLE _restaurant (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_external_source_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_image_url varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_image_attrs varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_address varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_city varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_state varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_country varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_latitude float DEFAULT NULL, _my_longitude float DEFAULT NULL, _my_zip varchar(15) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_phone varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_website varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_attire varchar(25) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_cuisine varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_cost int(11) DEFAULT NULL, _my_hours varchar(2000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_requires_reservations enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_has_bar enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_has_full_bar enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_has_beer_wine enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_has_street_parking enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_has_parking_lot enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_has_valet_parking enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_slug varchar(135) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_status varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT 'open', _my_source varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT 'Factual', _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_external_url varchar(2083) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_category set('auto','beauty','crafts','family','fashion','food','health','home','movies','music','people','sports','tech','travel','business','humor','animals','science','books','arts') COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_facebook_place_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_foursquare_venue_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__my_slug (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_slug), UNIQUE KEY _idx__my__external__source__id (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_external_source_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted), KEY _idx__my__latitude__longitude (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_latitude,_my_longitude), KEY _idx__my__longitude (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_longitude), KEY _idx__my__source (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_source)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _scheduled_task; CREATE TABLE _scheduled_task (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8mb4_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_task_type varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL, _my_status varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL, _my_schedule bigint(20) NOT NULL, _my_payload mediumtext COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL, _my_task_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _shape_name_map; CREATE TABLE _shape_name_map (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', _map varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _subdomain varchar(40) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _social_share; CREATE TABLE _social_share (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_object_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_object_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_share_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_share_count int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__my__share__type (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_share_type,_my_object_type,_my_object_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted), KEY _idx__my__object__type (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_object_type,_my_object_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _song; CREATE TABLE _song (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_image_url varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_image_attrs varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_slug varchar(135) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_external_url varchar(2083) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_category set('auto','beauty','crafts','family','fashion','food','health','home','movies','music','people','sports','tech','travel','business','humor','animals','science','books','arts') COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_source varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__my_slug (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_slug), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _suggestion; CREATE TABLE _suggestion (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_object_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_payload mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted), KEY _idx__my__object__type (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_object_type)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _tag; CREATE TABLE _tag (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _shape varchar(30) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _value varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _screen_name varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _created_dt bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _private varchar(6) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_shape,_id,_value,_screen_name), KEY _idx_shape (_app_id,_shape,_value), KEY _idx_shape_author (_app_id,_shape,_screen_name,_value), KEY _idx_author (_app_id,_screen_name,_value), KEY _idx_value (_app_id,_value)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _url_token; CREATE TABLE _url_token (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_token varchar(80) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_action varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_payload mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _my_expires bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__token (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_token), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted), KEY _idx__action (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_action)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _wine; CREATE TABLE _wine (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_image_url varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_image_attrs varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_winery varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_vintage int(11) DEFAULT NULL, _my_price float DEFAULT NULL, _my_region varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_varietal varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_slug varchar(135) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_external_url varchar(2083) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_category set('auto','beauty','crafts','family','fashion','food','health','home','movies','music','people','sports','tech','travel','business','humor','animals','science','books','arts') COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__my_slug (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_slug), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _ycomment; CREATE TABLE _ycomment (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_image_url varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_image_attrs varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_content varchar(2048) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_object_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_object_type varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_parent_id varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted), KEY _idx__object__id (_app_id,_my_object_id,_is_deleted)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _ynote; CREATE TABLE _ynote (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_image_url varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_image_attrs varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_slug varchar(135) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__my_slug (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_slug), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _yuser; CREATE TABLE _yuser (_app_id int(11) NOT NULL, _id int(11) NOT NULL, _version int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', _is_deleted enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _author varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _created_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _updated_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _title varchar(4000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _description mediumtext COLLATE utf8_bin, _private enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', _my_screen_name varchar(25) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_status varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'MEMBER', _my_site_url varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_tagline varchar(500) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_image_url varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_image_attrs varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_slug varchar(135) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_blog_name varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_blog_url varchar(2083) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _bacon_id varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_email varchar(200) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, _my_password varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_salt varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, _my_birth_year varchar(4) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_sex varchar(1) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_verification_status varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_verification_sent_date bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, _my_language varchar(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_language_variant varchar(3) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_region varchar(3) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_affiliate_id varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, _my_has_set_password enum('Y','N') COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', PRIMARY KEY (_app_id,_id), UNIQUE KEY _idx__my__email (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_email), UNIQUE KEY _idx__my_slug (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_slug), UNIQUE KEY _idx__bacon__id (_bacon_id), KEY _idx__author (_app_id,_author,_is_deleted), KEY _idx__status (_app_id,_is_deleted,_my_status)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS app_properties; CREATE TABLE app_properties (app_id bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL, disk_soft_quota bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL, disk_hard_quota bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '9223372036854775807', blob_copies smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', blob_count int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', disk_used bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (app_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS blob_id_allocator; CREATE TABLE blob_id_allocator (alloc_batch_size int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, alloc_next_id bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS blobs_to_delete; CREATE TABLE blobs_to_delete (blob_id bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (blob_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS database_for_blob_id_hash; CREATE TABLE database_for_blob_id_hash (generation smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL, blob_id_hash int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, db_index smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (generation,blob_id_hash)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS fast_path_blob_properties; CREATE TABLE fast_path_blob_properties (blob_id bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL, surrogate_blob_id bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0', mime_type_id smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL, blob_size int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, volume_id_0 smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', volume_id_1 smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', volume_id_2 smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', volume_id_3 smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', volume_id_4 smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', volume_id_5 smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', access_control smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', created_dt int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, migration_status bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, migration_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (blob_id), KEY migration_status (migration_status), KEY migration_status_2 (migration_status,migration_time), KEY access_control (access_control,migration_status), KEY migration_status_3 (migration_status,access_control), KEY migration_time (migration_time)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS filer_volume; CREATE TABLE filer_volume (id smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, rack varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, address0 varchar(255) NOT NULL, address1 varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, address2 varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, address3 varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, volume varchar(255) NOT NULL, state varchar(32) NOT NULL, read_only_mode tinyint(3) unsigned DEFAULT '0', repair_mode tinyint(3) unsigned DEFAULT '0', dir_hash_algorithm smallint(5) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, legacy_volume tinyint(3) unsigned DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (id), UNIQUE KEY filer_volume_pair (address0,volume)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS generation_base_bounds; CREATE TABLE generation_base_bounds (generation smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL, blob_id_base bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL, blob_id_limit bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (generation,blob_id_base)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS illegal_blob_md5_hash; CREATE TABLE illegal_blob_md5_hash (md5 binary(16) NOT NULL, access_control smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (md5)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS illegal_blob_sha1_hash; CREATE TABLE illegal_blob_sha1_hash (sha1 binary(20) NOT NULL, access_control smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (sha1)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS latest_versions; CREATE TABLE latest_versions (name varchar(32) NOT NULL, version_counter int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (name)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS md5_hash_surrogates; CREATE TABLE md5_hash_surrogates (md5 binary(16) NOT NULL, blob_id bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL, ref_count int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (md5)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS mime_type; CREATE TABLE mime_type (id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, type_string varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id), KEY id_for_mime_type (type_string)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1577 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS seq; CREATE TABLE seq (name varchar(20) NOT NULL, val bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (name)) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS services; CREATE TABLE services (ip varchar(16) NOT NULL, uuid varchar(64) NOT NULL, json varchar(1000) NOT NULL, created_date datetime NOT NULL, updated_date datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (ip,uuid), KEY freshness (updated_date)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS slow_path_blob_properties; CREATE TABLE slow_path_blob_properties (blob_id bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL, app_id bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL, profile_id bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, blob_filename varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, upload_ip bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, content_key varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, md5 binary(16) DEFAULT NULL, sha1 binary(20) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (blob_id), KEY blob_ids_for_app (app_id), KEY blob_ids_for_profile_id (profile_id), KEY blob_ids_for_md5 (md5), KEY blob_ids_for_sha1 (sha1), KEY blob_ids_for_content_key (content_key)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS upload_blacklist; CREATE TABLE upload_blacklist (kind varchar(16) NOT NULL, item_blacklisted bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL, access_control int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (kind,item_blacklisted)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS volume_blob_ids; CREATE TABLE volume_blob_ids (volume_id smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL, blob_id bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (volume_id,blob_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
